item.title: Lucid Logs - Dream Journal
item.description: The Power of Dreams I’m a chill young developer rising through the ranks, passionate about dreams and how they have shaped my life. I believe in the power of the subconscious - how our waking mind is just 20% of what makes us who we are. Dreams are powerful tools, recognized even from biblical days with Joseph and his coat of many colors, interpreting Pharaoh’s dreams. Why Lucid Logs? I wanted to build this app to help us connect with our subconscious more deeply, to understand what our dreams might be telling us.
